ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:55:11 [Issue ID 4000-83163] urn:comicvine:4000-83163 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 04:18:48. [Issue ID 83163]
ComicInfo.Summary: Spawn approaches Sam & Twitch again about discovering an effective way to stop Billy Kincaid from supplying Hell's army with souls. Meanwhile, a reassigned Jason Wynn hallucinates that he is as powerful, deadly, and ruthless as the legendary Genghis Khan. As he imagines himself "Jason the Conqueror," he opens fire on innocent people in a restaurant. Later, when he returns to reality, he finds himself dirty and disoriented in Spawn's alley where Bobby befriends him.
ComicInfo.Title: The Conqueror
